ListItem.Paragraph: Don't forget above your OLD FRIENDS
You faith is PERSONAL but it's not PRIVATE
Be creative in bringing your OLD and NEW friends together.
The greatest thing you could ever do for a friend is introduce them to FRIENDSHIP WITH JESUS.
One hundred years from now the only thing that will matter in person's life is what they BELIEVE ABOUT JESUS

Note.Paragraph: What friend do you need to lead toward JESUSthis year?
